entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, described as having green jet and scarlet eyes. He is killed by his own rebounding curse.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, described as a Seeker with unerring skill. He catches the Elder Wand in his free hand.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: A snake-like object that is compared to the spinning wand.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: A magical wand that flies high and spins across the ceiling. It is caught by Harry.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Voldemort's true identity, described as hitting the floor with a mundane finality.

relationships.description: Voldemort is killed by his own rebounding curse, which rebounds back to him and kills him.
Harry catches the Elder Wand in his free hand.
